Activity: Arrive at the office, log in to the computer, and check emails. Review any overnight communications.
Continue working on the preliminary document outlining the proposed data quality issue reporting process.
Develop a data quality issue reporting template. Include fields for issue description, affected data elements, severity level, reporter information, and proposed resolution.
Share the draft data quality issue reporting process and template with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 for feedback on usability and completeness. @PEOPLE Feedback on Data Quality Process.
Review any responses from yesterday's email to the nurses, medical records specialists, and physician champion and the developers/DBA about data quality issues.
Lunch break. Catch up on personal news and sports updates.
Incorporate feedback from @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 into the data quality issue reporting process and template.

Schedule a brief meeting with @itpm-1 to discuss the possibility of integrating the data quality issue reporting process into an existing IT service management system or a dedicated issue tracking tool. @PEOPLE Integration Options.
Refine the root cause analysis of identified data quality issues based on feedback and system documentation. Document the findings in a clear and concise manner.
Update the documentation for the identified data quality issues. Save the draft and prepare for the end of the workday.
Respond to any outstanding emails and complete administrative tasks.
